channel.title: CPP on 看山有色 听水无声
channel.description: Recent content in CPP on 看山有色 听水无声

item.title: C/C++ const with Pointers
item.description: auto n = 1; auto m = 3; int* ptr = &m; const int* const p = &n; // const pointer, const data * p = 0; // error p = ptr; // error const int* q = &n; // non-const pointer, const data * q = 0; // error q = ptr; int* const e = &n; // const pointer, non-const data * e = 0; e = ptr; // error int* r = &n; // non-cosnt pointer, non-const data * r = 0; r = ptr;
